description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国军事人物，中国人民解放军少将，曾任陕西省军区政治委员、第八届全国人大代表。
description.en: A military figure of the People's Republic of China, a major general of the People's Liberation Army, former political commissar of the Shaanxi Military District, and a delegate to the 8th National People's Congress.
A prefecture-level city in Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的社会主义国家，简称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia, commonly known as China.

en: Major general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的将级军官军衔。
description.en: A general officer rank in the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在中国陕西省设立的军队一级组织。
description.en: A primary-level military organization of the People's Liberation Army established in Shaanxi Province, China.

en: Delegate to the 8th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 在1993年至1998年期间，作为中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关成员的代表群体。
description.en: The group of representatives who were members of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China from 1993 to 1998.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
Lei Xingping is a native of Shaoyang, Hunan.

description.zh-cn: 雷星平是中华人民共和国的军事人物。
description.en: Lei Xingping is a military figure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 雷星平拥有中国人民解放军少将军衔。
description.en: Lei Xingping holds the rank of Major General in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 雷星平曾任陕西省军区政治委员。
description.en: Lei Xingping formerly served as the Political Commissar of the Shaanxi Military District.

description.zh-cn: 雷星平是第八届全国人民代表大会的代表。
description.en: Lei Xingping was a delegate to the 8th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 根据其维基百科分类，雷星平是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to his Wikipedia category, Lei Xingping is a member of the Communist Party of China.
